Articles.Content:
Does anyone know where I can find these bigger solar panels?

There are a smaller version already in game but it just looks awkward when they don't fit right.

I remember asking about them some time ago (topic since been deleted I don't know why) and someone linked me to them.

Thanks
umm, i'm sure they are the stock small solar panels, there is just 12 of them. I can fit 3 of them along one of the long girder parts, just as in that image.
AIES has some larger static panels. Fusty's Station Parts mod has a large static one too.
Try out the Kosmos Space Station Parts mod. Those solar panels are larger than you'll ever need
I'm pretty sure those large static panels are from the original FusTek station parts pack by Fusty.
I've seen those before. Try searching for Near-Future Parts or something like that.

umm, i'm sure they are the stock small solar panels, there is just 12 of them. I can fit 3 of them along one of the long girder parts, just as in that image.

It looks like they've had their rescale factor changed to be bigger too: They're the same size as the large radial batteries.
